original: Areskog, Nils Otto, tandläkare, Kalmar, f. 23/9/98 i Ålem, Kalmar 1., av kyrkoh. Carl A. o. Hilma Petersson. G. 25 m. Mimmie Albrechtsen. Barn: Nils-Holger f. 29, Ingrid 30’, Lillemor 33. — Studrex. i Kalmar 17, tandl:-kand. 19, tandl. 21. Assist, i Skellefteå 20, vik. i Falun 21, prakt, i Torsås 21-22, i Ronneby 23-31, i Kalmar sed. 32. Tandv.insp. i Kalmar 1. s. lands-tingsomr. sed. 42, led. av styr. f. Blek. tandl ifören. 29-31, ordf. i Kalmar 1. tandl isällsk. 33-42 o. sed. 44, v. ordf. o. sekr. i Ronneby skyttegille samt kårchef i Ronneby scoutkår 25-31, ordf. i Skidfrämj. Kalmar-avd. sed. 38, ordf. i Stora Rörs simsällsk. sed. 38, led. av styr. f. Sv. tandl. inköpsfören. Hobbies: skytte, fjällfärder, konst o. litteratur. Skidfrämj. förtj :GM, Sv :es scoutförb. förtj :t.
translated: Areskog, Nils Otto, dentist, Kalmar, born September 23, 1898 in Ålem, Kalmar County, son of the priest Carl A. and Hilma Petersson. Married to Mimmie Albrechtsen with three children: Nils-Holger (born 1929), Ingrid (born 1930), and Lillemor (born 1933). Graduated from Kalmar Secondary School in 1917, becoming a dental student in 1919, and a licensed dentist in 1921. Worked as an assistant in Skellefteå in 1920, a substitute in Falun in 1921, and practiced in Torsås from 1921-1922 and in Ronneby from 1923-1931. He worked in Kalmar from 1932 as a dental inspector in Kalmar County. He was a member of the board of the Blekinge Dental Association (1929-1931), chairman of the Kalmar Dental Society from 1933-1942, and vice-chairman and secretary of the Ronneby Shooting Society, as well as commander of the Ronneby Scout Corps from 1925-1931. He served as chairman of the Skidfrämjande (ski promotion) Kalmar Association from 1938, chairman of Stora Rörs Swim Club from 1938, and a member of the board for the Swedish Dental Purchasing Association. His hobbies included shooting, mountain trips, art, and literature. He earned the Swedish Scout Federation's award and the Ski Promotion Association's award.

awards.name: Swedish Scout Federation
awards.description: Awarded for contributions to the Ronneby Scout Corps

awards.name: Ski Promotion Association
awards.description: For contributions to the Skidfrämjande Kalmar Association
